title: Ep.3: Special Guest Michael Richardson, Seahawks Blowout, Packers Big Win, Rams Vs Bucs, Game Bets, Giveaways, and More
description: In this episode we have Mike Rich on as our guest where we discuss the life of a college athlete and embarrassing football stories. Before that we talk about the Packers and Rams superbowl aspirations along with the key to the vikings blowout win over the Seahawks. And don't forget about our 100 listener giveaway!
dc:creator: Griffin Proctor & Joe Jokonya
